item.description:
EconoCon is a mini gaming event held by the Plymouth State University gaming group that offers up gaming and sales for those in attendance.  Gaming typically runs from mid afternoon Friday till Midnight, then Saturday and Sunday from early morning till Midnight each day!  People bring games to play and food is available in the food court or downtown Plymouth just 2 minute walk away.  Registration for the weekend is pretty cheap.  I will continue to update on the details as they become known.

 

Information and future sign up is here

http://psugaming.wordpress.com/econocon-2/econocon-xiv-2/

The venue is open for gaming Saturday (7:30AM – 3:00 AM Sunday morning) and Sunday (7:30AM – 5PM).
item.name: Econo Con at Plymouth State University
